mapper.select: SELECT BI.INTG_MBR_NO , BI.BLG_MNU_NO , BI.BLG_NM , BI.BLG_INTRO , BI.TPC_CTG_NO , C.CTG_NM TPC_CTG_NM FROM BLOG_INFO BI JOIN CTG C ON BI.TPC_CTG_NO = C.CTG_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND INTG_MBR_NO = #{intgMbrNo} AND BLG_MNU_NO = #{blgMnuNo}
SELECT BLG_MNU_NO , BLG_MNU_NM FROM BLOG_MENU WHERE 1 = 1 AND INTG_MBR_NO = #{intgMbrNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY SEQ
